abstract: The credit card company will buy the online payment processor, which serves almost 300,000 merchants.
snippet: The credit card company will buy the online payment processor, which serves almost 300,000 merchants.
lead_paragraph: Visa, the giant credit card company, said Wednesday that it would buy CyberSource, an online payment processor, for about $2 billion.

headline.main: Visa to Buy CyberSource for $2 Billion
